title: Another Era
overview: The business world is like a microcosm of society. Greed is obsessive with the present and stops. The hatred is obsessed with the past and both lose. The creation of the new century requires not only dreams and foresight, but also the need to go upstream and turn the impossible into a Hong Kong spirit! In 2008, the financial tsunami swept the world, and the ambition businessman He Tiansheng wanted to engulf the group of Hong Kong's richest man, Fang Songyin, but was finally blocked by the rich businessman Zhuo Qitang. Naturally hateful, waiting for opportunities to revenge. Ten years later, he became the richest man, but he was devastated by the sky. He was hit by his son's accident and his heart was comatose. The young girl Zhuo Dingzhen, who is not awkward, is a family business. Under the help of private equity agent Gao Zhe, she is engaged in a competitive battle with Tiansheng. With the awakening of the church, the natural wife Ming Hao, Song Yin's grandson Fang Zeyu, entrepreneurial youth Cheng Kai have joined the battle. The fate of the people's enmity is entangled, and it is bound to set off another century war...
